test_complaints.title: Large pothole on Palm Beach Road
test_complaints.description: A very deep pothole has formed near the Vashi signal. It is causing slow traffic and risking accidents for two-wheelers.
test_complaints.address: Palm Beach Road, Vashi, Navi Mumbai

test_complaints.title: Garbage pile lying uncollected
test_complaints.description: Garbage has been piling up for 3 days near the market entrance. It smells terrible and is attracting strays.

test_complaints.title: Broken Streetlight causing darkness
test_complaints.description: The streetlight at the corner of Sector 4 is not functional. The area is pitch dark at night, raising safety concerns.

test_complaints.title: Water leakage in main pipeline
test_complaints.description: There is a significant water leak from the main supply pipe. Gallons of clean water are being wasted every hour.

test_complaints.title: Illegal debris dumping on footpath
test_complaints.description: Construction debris has been dumped on the footpath, blocking the way for pedestrians completely.

test_complaints.title: Open Manhole near School
test_complaints.description: A manhole cover is missing right in front of the primary school gate. This is extremely dangerous for children.

test_complaints.title: Fallen Tree blocking road
test_complaints.description: A large tree has fallen across the internal road due to last night's winds. Traffic is completely blocked.

test_complaints.title: Traffic Signal Malfunction
test_complaints.description: The traffic signal at the main junction is stuck on red for all sides, causing massive confusion and traffic jams.

test_complaints.title: Dead animal not removed
test_complaints.description: A dead dog has been lying on the side of the road for two days. Please arrange for removal immediately.

test_complaints.title: Park bench broken and rusty
test_complaints.description: The benches in the community park are broken and have sharp rusty edges. It is dangerous for senior citizens.
